import * as React from 'react'; import { getStartingDay, getEndingDay, getDaysInMonth, generateUnexistingDays, generateUnavailableDays, generateAvailableDays, getEndingDate } from '../../util/CalendarModalFunctions'; let date = new Date(); const month = [ 'January', 'February', 'March', 'April', 'May', 'June', 'July', 'August', 'September', 'October', 'November', 'December' ]; const days = [ 'Sunday', 'Monday', 'Tuesday', 'Wednesday', 'Thursday', 'Friday', 'Saturday' ]; const today = new Date(); export const CalendarModal = () => { return (

{month[date.getMonth()]} {date.getFullYear()}

{days.map((day) => { return (

{day.slice(0, 2)}

); })}
{generateUnexistingDays( getStartingDay(today.getMonth(), today.getFullYear()) )} {generateUnavailableDays(1, today.getDate())} {generateAvailableDays( today.getDate(), getEndingDate(today.getMonth(), today.getFullYear()).getDate() )}
); };
